chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: What you need to get WASP installed.

section.title: Database configuration
section.para: WASP database tables are defined using SQL files in the MySQL dialect. These files should be loaded into a MySQL client to create the database, users, tables and initial state information.

section.para: Advanced instructions for building architecture-optimized versions of WASP dependencies.

section.title: Deploy WASP
section.para: Check out the latest version of WASP, build with Maven and deploy.
